body:
My razer deathadder served me well and I used it for 3 years.... The scroll wheel broke so now I need a new mouse ;-;. Any suggestions? (anything below 50 dollars is my budget)

Thanks!
body_tagged:
My razer deathadder served me well and I used it for 3 years.... The scroll wheel broke so now I need a new mouse ;-;. Any suggestions? (anything below 50 dollars is my budget)

Thanks!
title: NEW MOUSE!

replies.body:
http://www.bestbuy.com/site/lenovo-y-gaming-precision-mouse-black/4411200.p?id=1219744557275&skuId=4... 
Get this mouse, it's only $30 right now, since it's on sale and it works really great. I currently have that mouse right now.

replies.body: Before I got my Deathadder, I used SteelSeries 100. Its a decent mouse imo, its worth its price (£29.99 in the UK) so just do the conversion and you can get good cps with it.

replies.body: Razer mamba te is a good choise. I bought it from bestbuy, Chicago and it was $80. Or I'd suggest deathadder which is $70
replies.body_tagged: Razer mamba te is a good choise. I bought it from bestbuy, Chicago and it was $80. Or I'd suggest deathadder which is $70

replies.body:
Razer Mamba has a laser sensor.

Laser sensor= acceleration/jitter

acceleration/jitter= not very good
replies.body_tagged:
Razer Mamba has a laser sensor.

Laser sensor= acceleration/jitter

acceleration/jitter= not very good

replies.body:
Do you want a mouse similarly designed to a deathadder?
How good do you want the mouse software to be? (e.g: razer synapse)
What games do you play?

replies.body:
my scroll wheel has been broken for around a year and a half now, the mouse still works fine.

would recommend naga 2014 edition (if you're looking to hotkey)
replies.body_tagged:
my scroll wheel has been broken for around a year and a half now, the mouse still works fine.

would recommend naga 2014 edition (if you're looking to hotkey)

replies.body: Steel series rival is pretty good
replies.body_tagged: Steel series rival is pretty good

replies.body:
Nagas are bad as fuck and have acceleration problems tho ;l

For anyone wondering, basically don't get anything with a laser sensor, or any Razer mouse except for the DeathAdder. Mad Catz is also not a good mouse. 

These are the mouse that are the top of the line.

Logitech G502

Razer Deathadder 2013/ Chroma

Mionix Castor

Anything from Zowie

Anything from Corsair

Logitech G402

Anything from Steelseries without a laser sensor

I've had both the DeathAdder 2013 and the Mionix castor. Can confirm they are both very good mice.
